description: This file provides a products data service with multi-source strategy, including functions to list products, get product details by ID, and fetch facet options, utilizing Supabase, REST API, and mock fallbacks.

methods.name: listProducts
methods.description: Fetches a list of products with optional filters and pagination, using Supabase if available, otherwise falls back to HTTP client.

methods.name: getProductById
methods.description: Retrieves a single product by ID, using Supabase if available, otherwise falls back to HTTP client.

methods.name: getFacetOptions
methods.description: Fetches distinct categories, brands, and price bounds from the database, with fallback to HTTP client.
